name: Thirty-six Years Of Meme
summary: Listen to this episode from Rizamblings on Spotify. A most delightful ramble with the brilliant, Tom Jepson, on a long list of UX, design, community, personal goals, hype, books, jelly babies, and so, so much more!  Find our guest: Tom Jepson -> @thepixelgrid Don't forget to #RizambleAlong on Twitter, find me -> @rizbizkits
